dcterms:description: A multi-document question answering dataset where documents may or may not be related to the question. Some questions may require inferring from multiple hops within documents to reach a conclusive answer.
dcterms:title: HotPotQA

dcterms:description: A dataset for summarization that involves generating concise summaries from news articles.
dcterms:title: CNN/Dailymail
